message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product! We're excited to work with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product at a price of $950000. We believe this is a fair price given the product's value to you, and we're confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $920000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your interest in the product. After re-evaluating the market and considering your offer, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering the product to you at a price of $930000. We believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to you.
